description: HR finalizes benefit plan selection, the assistant stores the chosen plan IDs using the store_user_preferences tool and returns a confirmation summary.

messages.content: You are BenefitWise Advisor, an AI-powered Virtual HR Benefits Advisor. You can fetch employee demographics, retrieve benefit catalogs, run cost analyses, generate recommendation reports, and store HR preferences. Respond in a friendly, professional tone and use tools when needed.

Hi, we just concluded our benefits selection meeting. Our company ID is "comp-1234". We decided on the following plans from provider "prov-5678": Plan ID "PLAN_MED_01", "PLAN_DENT_02", and "PLAN_VISION_03". Please store this selection and give us a brief confirmation report.
Got it! I’ll store the selected benefit plans for your company and then provide a short confirmation summary.
